questions.prompt: In general, would you say your health is:
Compared to one year ago, how would you rate your health in general now?

enumeration.label: Much better now than one year ago
enumeration.value: Much better now than one year ago

enumeration.label: Somewhat better now than one year ago
enumeration.value: Somewhat better now than one year ago

enumeration.label: Somewhat worse than one year ago
enumeration.value: Somewhat worse than one year ago

enumeration.label: Much worse than one year ago
enumeration.value: Much worse than one year ago

questions.prompt: In a typical day, does your health now limit vigorous activities, such as running, lifting heavy objects, participating in strenuous sports?
In a typical day, does your health now limit moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf?
In a typical day, does your health now limit lifting or carrying groceries?
In a typical day, does your health now limit climbing several flights of stairs?
In a typical day, does your health now limit climbing one flight of stairs?
In a typical day, does your health now limit bending, kneeling, or stooping?
In a typical day, does your health now limit walking more than a mile?
In a typical day, does your health now limit walking several blocks?
In a typical day, does your health now limit walking one block?
In a typical day, does your health now limit bathing or dressing yourself?
During the past 4 weeks, has your PHYSICAL health meant that you cut down the amount of time you spent on work or other activities?
During the past 4 weeks, has your PHYSICAL health meant that you accomplished less than you would like?
During the past 4 weeks, has your PHYSICAL health meant that you were limited in the kind of work or other activities?
During the past 4 weeks, has your PHYSICAL health meant that you had difficulty performing the work or other activities (for example, it took extra effort)?
During the past 4 weeks, have EMOTIONAL problems meant that you cut down the amount of time you spent on work or other activities?
During the past 4 weeks, have EMOTIONAL problems meant that you accomplished less than you would like?
During the past 4 weeks, have EMOTIONAL problems meant that you didn't do work or other activities as carefully as usual?
During the past 4 weeks, to what extent has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors, or groups?
How much bodily pain have you had during the past 4 weeks?
During the past 4 weeks, how much did pain interfere with your normal work (including both work outside the home and housework)?
In the past four weeks, how much of the time did you feel full of pep?

enumeration.label: A good bit of the time
enumeration.value: A good bit of the time
